channel.title: CVE Feed for TP-Link -- Archer AX3000
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TP-Link -- Archer AX3000

item.title: CVE-2024-38471|2024-08-02T04:12:25.043Z -- tp-link -- archer%20ax3000
item.description: Multiple TP-LINK products allow a network-adjacent attacker with an administrative privilege to execute arbitrary OS commands by restoring a crafted backup file. The affected device, with the initial configuration, allows login only from the LAN port or Wi-Fi.
